articles.title: Goldman downgrades Maruti Suzuki to 'neutral' on slowing demand for small cars - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Goldman Sachs lowers the target price for the Maruti Suzuki stock by 20 percent to to Rs 8,800 after domestic sales declined in March to 139,952 units, down from 143,899 units a year ago
